::Wheeljack::

         Wheeljack raises an eyebrow, as much as a robot could manage, at
least.

           "Hmmm.......Somebody wants to see Zardus???" Then, Wheeljack
looked over at Gotron, "Hey, I have nooooo idea what this creature is, but I
suggest we get it back to base for me to run some tests, and for Zardus to
get this message......Now, let's see," Wheeljack said, reaching into a
storage compartment in his arm.

        "Ah ha!" Wheeljack exlaimed as he pulled out a little capsule thing.

       "This should do the trick," He said, and pressed a button on it.  The
little capsule thing turned into a large jet-powered board.

         "Now, let's get the probe on here, then my little invention here
will take it back to base, actually, wherever I make it go.  Here, help me
lift this," He said over to Gotron, still wondering what the heck that
message was all about.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
::Dark Lavacons::

          The Dark Lavacons, still waiting to have some fun, wnet and just
shot black fire on the ground, burning trees and stuff.
